about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Design for Climate
about.appDescription: Design for Climate is a climate-friendly learning platform for children. We provide guidance on environmental protection, sustainability, energy saving, and nature-friendly living with our 4 expert AI assistants.

yaprak.name: Leaf
yaprak.title: Environment Assistant
yaprak.description: Guidance on environmental protection and sustainability

robi.name: Robi
robi.title: Energy Assistant
robi.description: Expert in energy saving and renewable energy topics

bugday.name: Wheat
bugday.title: Agriculture Assistant
bugday.description: Consultation on sustainable agriculture and food security

damla.name: Drop
damla.title: Water Assistant
damla.description: Guidance on water saving and water resource protection

about.aiLearningDescription: Real-time chat and learning experience with 4 expert assistants.
about.multilingualSupportDescription: Support for Turkish, English, Spanish, German and Dutch languages.
about.progressTrackingDescription: Track your conversation history and learning statistics.
about.securePlatformDescription: Ad-free, privacy-focused and child-friendly secure environment.
about.missionTitle: Raising conscious generations to fight climate change.
about.missionDescription: We help children become aware of environmentally friendly living, enabling them to take the first steps towards a sustainable future.
about.contactTitle: Share your opinions and suggestions with us
about.privacyPolicyDescription: Learn how your personal data is protected
about.feedbackDescription: Share your opinions and suggestions with us
